Title: Watching a friendly match between armymen and civilians  (Selected from the Huxian peasant painting exhibition)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The score, kept on the blackboard, is 48-44 for the military Guard Company (警卫连) against the civilian Red Guards (红卫兵). The game most probably is basketball.This poster was produced for export, with captions in Chinese, English, French, and German.
